mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sarsparilla
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in yellow box with English and Chinese text. Paper instructions in Chinese and English in the box. The following text is printed on the front of the bottle label: "WATSON'S SARSPARILLA No. 64 Cools and purifies the blood making it both rich and red. Directions, One dessert spoonful to be taken in a little water three times a day Manufactured by A.S. Watsons LTD. LONDON, HONG KONG, & CHINA". Chinese text is printed on the back of the label.
